segments.text: They promised us a sea view .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , you can just see the sea . Between the factory chimneys .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Isn't it awful ? I can't bear to look at it . I don't think I can stand this place for two weeks .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , it can't be helped . We'll just have to put up with it .
segments.speaker: S2
